attributes.action: bring back the death penalty for serious crimes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i think that these days there is no real punishment for criminals, they get put in jail, never serving the full sentence and often come out and re offend, jails are overflowing, so bring back a death penalty, people might just think twice, were there a real punishment, i think for paedophiles, violent offenders, rapists, etc there should be a death penalty, this country is falling to pieces and looks to get worse, something harsh needs to be done

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
